text: <!here|@here> we’re working with josh and iontank to swap our goldspike cubby out for a production model.  i’ll work with johs on the right window of time so that it doesnt imapct a) our ability to support myles deploying the 1.1.3 code pkg and b) doesnt impact any proposed 1.2 work (focusing on phones in cubbies).

<@U02E3CRMA> and <@U0EL0GLEL> to safeguard ourselves though, what kind of preperations can we do on our side to continue _some_ work or at least be able to troubleshoot any quesitons that come up while we are cubby-less?

Only thing we cant recreate without the cubby is the door opening and the touch screen. both of which dont really seem to be having any issues or would really seem like the type of thing that we would need to troubleshoot in the timeframe we are cubby less. everything else we still would have the other two screens, and our standard rig. dont really think there is much to worry about there
Reminder: Remember to log your time in Harvest!
